tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CityInfrastructureMaintenanceSchedule (
    maintenance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    activity VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE city_infrastructure_maintenance (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    infrastructure_type VARCHAR(100),
    maintenance_activity VARCHAR(200),
    maintenance_schedule TIMESTAMP,
    responsible_person VARCHAR(150)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_id UUID,
    activity_type VARCHAR(100),
    executed_by VARCHAR(150),
    executed_on TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  infrastructure_id INT,
  activity_id INT,
  scheduled_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR
);
